name: Angry Video Game Nerd
description:
Scratch Version

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/786541130/

Based on a web series, Angry Video Game Nerd by James Rofie.

Inspired on a unlicensed Super Famicom game, Hong Kong 97 and the Atari 2600 game, The Angry Video Game Nerd.

AVGN logo is downloaded from Google Images

Music is downloaded from Internet Archives

Explosion GIF is downloaded from GIFER (Even tho I edit).

Published on Jan. 14, 2023

Made in Scratch 3.0
